summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganma:nyo Pure Cleansing Water Sensitive thoroughly cleanses not only makeup but also skin impurities with 3 fermented complex that reveal smooth skin surface and moist skin that never gets dry.
details: DetailsFeaturesTriple + micellar technology provides more powerful and thorough cleaning experience without irritation to the skin.Its low pH level that is similar to the skin's pH level creates a balanced and healthy skin environment.It is suitable for all skin types, especially for sensitive skin.Key IngredientsPear Flower Extract - Soothing, antioxidant and moisturizing properties.Hyalpol Glow - Contains 5 types of hyaluronic acids to help skin brightening and moisturizing.Formulated WithoutFragranceSiliconParabenItem 2626993How To UseSaturate a cotton pad.Gently sweep away all makeup and impurities from the skin.IngredientsWater, Dipropylene Glycol,Propanediol, Polyglyceryl-4 Caprate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Polyglyceryl-3 Cocoate, Polyglyceryl-6 Caprylate, Caprylyl Glycol, Gluconolactone, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Citrate, Methylpropanediol, Pyrus Communis(Pear)Flower Extract, Capryloyl Salicylic Acid, Tromethamine, Benzyl Glycol, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Cetearyl Olicate, Ethylhexyglycerin, Sorbitan Olivate.
how_to_use: Saturate a cotton pad.Gently sweep away all makeup and impurities from the skin.

reviews.headline: Absolutely love this!
reviews.comments: I break out easily‚Ä¶ it doesn't matter if it's  make up, skin care, hormones or stress. This has definitely helped. I've even had my teen start using this after his worlouts at school. It's so good I have completely stopped using my cereve and cetaphil products. I trashed them all.  My breakouts are all starting to go away and heal. Even the ones that have been there for years. Now I'm just dealing with the scars. But, I'm still so happy on how much it's improved. I didnt want to right a review at first because I started to become so skeptical on if I would ever find a product that worked. However, Its been 2 months and I'm so thankful I tried this brand. I will be buying this brand for our skin needs going forward.

reviews.headline: burns your eyes
reviews.comments: i use micellar water to remove leftover eye makeup and this one BURNS my eyes so bad. i've tried so hard to use it but it stings so much. wish i saw the reviews saying this

reviews.headline: CLEAN!
reviews.comments: I love how clean this makes my skin

reviews.headline: CLEAN!
reviews.comments: I love how clean this makes my skin

reviews.headline: Not so friendly for the eyes makeup remover
reviews.comments: Compared to La Roche-Posay (since it's pretty much same price) they have a bigger size. For sensitive skin, not really taking off all makeup, especially for the eye area, may cause a little irritation for your eyes. It's big size so very saving and able to use for a long time.

reviews.headline: BURNS MY EYES
reviews.comments: I used this yesterday and my eyes started burning immediately. My eyes haven't stopped burning since yesterday. Im extremely upset and concerned about my eyes

reviews.headline: Not for sensitive skin!!
reviews.comments: I bought this because I have extremely sensitive skin and micellar water generally works well as a cleanser for me.  This claims to be for sensitive skin, but it burns and leaves little red bumps (irritation marks) around my face. I should have stuck with what I knew but took a shot with this and highly regret it. I gave it two stars because it may work for others who aren't as sensitive as I am.

reviews.headline: Great for the face but burns my eyes
reviews.comments: Love this for all over the face and doesnt feel drying but i hate it for my eyes always burn will stick with Bioderma

reviews.headline: It is so good, I love how it takes off everything
reviews.comments:
I have such sensitive skin and this really doesn't strip
My face of its moisture and it takes everything off so nicely !! I recommend esp since my normal oil cleanser is discontinued I now will be using this - even my sebaceous filaments went off too !

reviews.headline: I love this product
reviews.comments: Love this product. I will definitely buy this again

reviews.headline: absolutely LOVE this cleansing oil
reviews.comments: This cleansing oil is lightweight & gentle on the skin! It easily removes my makeup/sunscreen & leaves my skin feeling so clean ü´ß It also deeply cleanses my pores & helps to clear out blackheads!! Would definitely recommend ‚≠êÔ∏è

reviews.headline: great product
reviews.comments: I am absolutely thrilled with this micellar water! Cleansing Water Sensitive gently removes make-up and impurities without drying out or irritating the skin. The formula is perfect for sensitive skin - it feels refreshed, soothed and nourished after cleansing. I particularly like that it doesn't leave a sticky residue and my skin doesn't feel tight afterwards. A great product for gentle but effective cleansing - a clear recommendation!

reviews.headline: BEST cleansing water EVER
reviews.comments: Im not kidding when I say I have tried so hard to find a cleansing water that works for my super sensitive skin that doesnt make me feel disgusting or break out and i would ONE HUNDRED PERCENT tell anyone they have to try this

reviews.headline: I really liked it!
reviews.comments: I likes this serious. It is cleaning my skin very well.

reviews.headline: Great cleansing water
reviews.comments: Very similar to my Bioderma, in effectiveness, quantity and price. Loving it for eye makeup removal for first cleanse and for a quick cleanse in morning to refresh face. They need to fix the cap though, when i press the top down it wont stay.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: This product is amazing. I have sensitive skin and any other cleansing water I have ever used leaves me with dry patches around my mouth forehead and nose. I cant attest to its ability to remove makeup on its own because I only ever use it after cleansing but it does a great job at removing anything left over and leaving my skin feeling clean, fresh, and still hydrated. It also has no strong scent, which wouldnt bother me personally but I know that it is important to many. A perfect addition to my skincare routine. You will not regret, especially for the price and the amount of product!

reviews.headline: I was super hesitant, but I'm glad I tried this
reviews.comments: I've been using ma:nyo Pure Cleansing Water Sensitive for a while now, and it's easily one of the best micellar waters I've tried. My skin is sensitive, and a lot of cleansing waters either leave it feeling stripped or cause irritation. This one doesn't. It's super gentle, removes makeup effortlessly (even mascara), and doesn't leave any weird residue. My skin actually feels clean and hydrated after using it. No burning, no dryness‚Äîjust a solid, effective cleanse. If you have sensitive skin and struggle to find a micellar water that works without irritation, this one is definitely worth trying.

reviews.headline: Great Double Cleanse Product!
reviews.comments:
‚≠êÔ∏è I received this Pure Cleansing Water Sensitive for free from Manyo and Picky. 

üíúFirst off you get a huge 16.9 Fl oz bottle. This will definitely last you awhile and is very reasonably priced. Its texture/color is literally like water, no sticky feeling, and has no scent at all. I actually used this a couple different ways. To remove makeup, and to cleanse in my double cleanse routine. As a makeup remover it did remove most makeup, but it did leave some of my stubborn waterproof makeup behind. Now as a regular cleanser is where I felt it really shined and my preferred use. It definitely exfoliated my skin by removing any excess sebum, so it made my skin very smooth. I have large pores; and it penetrated deep into them to thoroughly clean, and made them unnoticeable. It never dried out my skin and made it very hydrated. Along with never breaking me out, so it really is great for sensitive skin. It never even burned my eyes when I went over them! With some cleansing/micellar water they leave a film behind, and this product did not. I use this as my 2nd cleanse after my oil based face wash/cleanser. Water based products should be last in your cleansing routine. I love the way my skin feels and looks using this. It also was easy to apply onto a cotton swab. I will definitely continue to use this and highly recommend it!

‚ùåThe only negative and reason why I deducted 1 star is that I wish it removed all my makeup. It unfortunately left behind some of my waterproof products. You will need to use another cleanser before this to fully remove all makeup.

reviews.headline: Love it so much!
reviews.comments:
I've been a loyal MANYO fan for nearly 5 years now, ever since I discovered their Bifida Biome Complex Ampoule. Since then, I've always kept at least one MANYO product in my routine, and their Pure Cleansing Water Sensitive is no exception!

This cleansing water is incredibly gentle yet so effective‚Äîit removes makeup in seconds without leaving my dry, sensitive skin feeling stripped or tight. It has no fragrance, which is a huge win for me, and the formula feels so soothing. I also love the sleek packaging, which makes it a treat to use every day.

I've been pairing it with the MANYO cleansing oil, and together they're the ultimate dream team for a thorough yet gentle double cleanse. My skin feels clean, soft, and perfectly balanced after every use. Highly recommend this for anyone with sensitive skin!

reviews.headline: Gentle Cleansing
reviews.comments:
This is a gentle, vegan, healthy pH balancing all in one facial cleansing water that can be used by all skin types to cleanse makeup and impurities from your skin. It improves damaged skin barrier and has  enhanced soothing effects.

‚Ä¢ I've used this with cotten pads to remove makeup (not waterproof), and it did a Wonder job at lifting everything off. I also use it sometimes just to clean and refresh my face when it's feeling hot and sweaty from all of this summer heat. To my surprise, it removes a lot of dirt and caked up grime. I love that it effectively cleanses my skin without irritation and allows my pores to breathe. It removes excess sebum, is hydrating, and feels soothing to the skin.

media.headline: It is so good, I love how it takes off everything
Why you need to get the Manyo cleansing water
media.caption: A must have in your routine‚úÖ
